item.title: About me
item.author: tx991020@gmail.com (andy wu)
item.description: My name is Andy Wu. I have the following qualities: 后端工程师 极客，热爱学习，热爱开源,涉猎范围广 理念:Keep It Simple and Stupid 我的技能树 Python Golang Java DB: mysql, mongodb,redis,elasticsearch,etcd Web: Gin,Beego,Flask,Django,SpringBoot MQ: Kafka 任务调度：Celery,APScheduler 大数据：Spark/Pyspark,Pandas,ELK Stack, Hadoop,Hive,Flume 爬虫：Scarpy,Pyspider,Colly,Pholcus,Pyquery,Goquery DevOps: Docker,Ansible
